column4: I apologize, because i know this question has been asked a million times, but i can never memorize the command to install the ubuntu compiz cube. Can someone please help me with the audo apt-get install compiz-something...? i forget what the whole command is, thanks
ubotu: how do i ask you questions, what is the format?
Just type the question and people will answer
I do?  What does this have to do with ubuntu?
